agent-add-rag.description: Adds a new RAG to an agent in the database for the user.

props.name: rag_id
props.description: The ID of the RAG to add to the agent

agent-create.description: Creates a new agent in the database for the user.

props.name: name
props.description: A name for the agent

props.name: description
props.description: A brief description of what the model does

props.name: custom_prompt
props.description: A model that the agent will use for processing prompts

props.name: default_llm
props.description: The language model which the agent will use for processing prompts

props.name: tags
props.description: An array of tags for the agent. Example: ["assistant","tag"]

agent_delete.description: Delete a specific agent by its ID

agent_get.description: Retrieve details of a specific agent

agent-list.description: Retrieves the list of agents created by and available to the user.

agent_prompt_completion.description: Prompt an agent with a message and get a response

props.name: prompt
props.description: The text prompt for the agent

props.name: searchType
props.description: The search type to use for RAG model

props.name: k
props.description: Number of documents to return

props.name: fetchK
props.description: Amount of documents to pass to MMR algorithm

props.name: lambdaMult
props.description: Diversity of results returned by MMR (0 for minimum, 1 for maximum)

props.name: scoreThreshold
props.description: Minimum relevance threshold for similarity_score_threshold

agent_update.description: Update the details of a specific agent

props.name: agentId
props.description: Select the agent to update

props.name: name
props.description: New name for the agent

props.name: description
props.description: New description for the agent

props.name: customPrompt
props.description: New custom prompt for the agent

props.name: defaultLlm
props.description: New default LLM for the agent

props.name: status
props.description: New status for the agent

props.name: visibility
props.description: New visibility setting for the agent

file_upload.description: Upload a file to Straico API for processing.

props.name: file
props.description: The file to upload. Supported file types: pdf, docx, pptx, txt, xlsx, mp3, mp4, html, csv, json, py, php, js, css, cs, swift, kt, xml, ts, png, jpg, jpeg, webp, gif

image_generation.description: Enables users to generate high-quality images based on textual descriptions.

props.name: variations
props.description: Number of images to generate.

props.name: model
props.description: Select the image generation model.

props.name: size
props.description: The desired image dimensions.

props.name: description
props.description: A detailed textual description of the image to be generated.

prompt_completion.description: Enables users to generate prompt completion based on a specified model.

props.name: model
props.description: The model which will generate the completion. Some models are suitable for natural language tasks, others specialize in code.

props.name: prompt
props.description: The prompt text for which completions are requested

props.name: fileUrls
props.description: URLs of files to be processed by the model (maximum 4 URLs), previously uploaded via the File Upload endpoint

props.name: youtubeUrls
props.description: URLs of YouTube videos to be processed by the model (maximum 4 URLs)

props.name: imageUrls
props.description: URLs of images to be processed by the model, previously uploaded via the File Upload endpoint

props.name: displayTranscripts
props.description: If true, returns transcripts of the files. Note: Either File URLs or YouTube URLs are required when this is enabled

props.name: temperature
props.description: This setting influences the variety in the model\

props.name: maxTokens
props.description: Set the limit for the number of tokens the model can generate in response

create_rag.description: Create a new RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) base in the database.

props.name: name
props.description: Represents the name of the RAG base

props.name: description
props.description: Represents the description of the agent

props.name: file
props.description: Represents the file to be attached. Accepted file extensions are: pdf, docx, csv, txt, xlsx, py

props.name: chunkingMethod
props.description: Represents the chunking method to be used for generating the RAG base. The default value is fixed_size

props.name: chunkSize
props.description: The size of each chunk (default: 1000)

props.name: chunkOverlap
props.description: The overlap between chunks (default: 50)

props.name: separator
props.description: The separator to use for fixed_size chunking method

props.name: separators
props.description: The separators to use for recursive chunking method

props.name: breakpointThresholdType
props.description: The breakpoint threshold type for semantic chunking method

props.name: bufferSize
props.description: The buffer size for semantic chunking method

delete_rag.description: Delete a specific RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) base by its ID.

props.name: ragId
props.description: The ID of the RAG base to delete

get_rag_by_id.description: Retrieve a specific RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) base by its ID.

props.name: ragId
props.description: The ID of the RAG base to retrieve.

list_rags.description: List all RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) bases for a user.

rag_prompt_completion.description: Send a prompt to a specific RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) model.

props.name: ragId
props.description: The ID of the RAG base to query

props.name: prompt
props.description: A text prompt for the RAG model

props.name: model
props.description: The specific LLM to be used

props.name: searchType
props.description: Type of search to perform

props.name: k
props.description: Number of documents to return

props.name: fetchK
props.description: Amount of documents to pass to MMR algorithm

props.name: lambdaMult
props.description: Diversity of results return by MMR (1 for minimum and 0 for maximum)

props.name: scoreThreshold
props.description: Minimum relevance threshold for similarity_score_threshold

update_rag.description: Update an existing RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) base with additional files.

props.name: ragId
props.description: The ID of the RAG base to update.

props.name: file
props.description: Represents the file to be attached. Accepted file extensions are: pdf, docx, csv, txt, xlsx, py.
